children.value: Create Custom Firewall rules in the dashboard
Create Custom Firewall rules under the
This feature is only available for selected customers on an Enterprise plan.
To create a new Custom Firewall rule:
Log in to the Cloudflare dashboard.
tab and choose the site for which you want to create a rule.
In the page that displays, enter a descriptive name for the rule in
drop-down list to choose an HTTP property. For each request, the value of the property you choose for
is compared to the value you specify for

tells Cloudflare to refuse requests that match the conditions you specified.
